caption.title: Experimental positive control for two-color STORM colocalization analysis.
caption.p: We used two differently labelled versions of SNA as an experimental colocalization positive control. This served us also as a nominator to better evaluate the degree of colocalization of our test molecule pair SNA/EGFR. A549 cells were labelled with two SNA variants, conjugated to Alexa 647 as well Alexa 555 ( A). Both localization datasets were analyzed using CBC resulting in a colocalization value C A associated to each individual localization. A histogram of C A for one channel is shown in B. We set the threshold to 0.3, above which localizations were counted as colocalized. C shows one SNA dataset color coded according to C A. D shows all localizations from the same dataset with C A > 0.3.
Click here for additional data file.
